name: Sprites at Play
description:
Fast platforming, people hiding, others seeking. If you are the last one to be found you win! This is hide-and-seek tag brought back in a digital world. Instead of playing at your usual areas like a playground or at your house. You can get swept away in high icy mountain vistas or a small cave with glowing crystals. I have fun with your friends as you explore and hide from them.

Game mechanics:
Hosting lobbies
Classic 3d platforming
Hiding a cool digital world
Seeking your friends as they hide from you

Controls:
(WASD) for movement
(Spacebar) for jump
(LShift) For dash and air dive
(1&2) assign roles
Some controller support in the gameplay itself not in the menu sadly.
